thread.title: Goldman Sachs says to hire several hundred people for its Warsaw unit
thread.title_full: Goldman Sachs says to hire several hundred people for its Warsaw unit | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Goldman Sachs says to hire several hundred people for its Warsaw unit
text:
WARSAW Aug 27 Goldman Sachs said on Thursday it will hire "several hundred" employees for its Warsaw-based technology and operations units over the next three years.
"In a strategic decision, the firm will now expand its footprint in Warsaw. The expansion will be realized in a phased approach over the next three years," said Goldman Sachs spokesman for central and eastern Europe, Adib Sisani.
The U.S. bank has had an office in Warsaw since 2011, including a small technology unit. (Reporting by Marcin Goettig and Pawel Florkiewicz; Editing by Wiktor Szary)
